title: () Sabugal - 1-3 Bairro do Outeiro
description: Service terminal - water drain wc -

title: (6320) Sabugal - 5 Rua Estádio Municipal
description: Laundry self-service

title: (6320-369) Sabugal - 3 Rua da Devesa
description: Free park near the fire station. No service but there are services nearby.

title: (6320-394) Sabugal - 6,6320-394 Rua Nova do Rio

title: (6320-328) Sabugal - 7 Travessa Doutor Francisco Maria Manso
title_short: (6320-328) Sabugal - 7 Travessa Doutor Francisco Maria Manso
description: A large parking on a firm ground, flat in some areas and with a large tree very shady, next to the castle. There is a fountain and public toilets. Small vehicles only.

title: (6320) - Barragem do Sabugal
description: Fountain with tap. In a bend, between the dam and Sabugal, so it is difficult to park for large camper vans.

title: (6320) Sabugal -
description: At the edge of the lake, quiet corner at the end of a dead end (possibility of continuing on a dirt road)

title: (6320) Aldeia de Santo António -
description:
Free parking day night with table, barbecue and washing up area with free drinking water near the dam and a small church.
ideal to spend one or more nights in peace.
The slightly sloping land can accommodate several CCs.
the forest firefighters came by and confirmed the tranquility of the place.

title: (6320) Sabugal - Unnamed Road
description: Great spot on the lake, swimming, it passes in heavy weight. No services.

title: (6320) - Barragem do Sabugal
description: Just before the notified car park, a small dirt road runs along the lake. possibility of finding other spots in the middle of nature, shaded and more out of sight.

title: () Sabugal - Unnamed Road
description: Aire de Malcata, 6 km from Sabugal. The area appears under development. Services are clean and free and the view is beautiful

title: (6320) - Unnamed Road
description: At the top of a ridge bordering a small, relatively quiet road. A flat place with a view over the valley. Space for several vehicles. I spent a quiet night there. The spot is clean, thank you for picking up your waste. No services, possible to cross goats.

title: (6320) - 15 Rua de Santo Antão
description: Picnic air in the middle of nowhere, stone tables, a small chapel. We did not sleep there because too early but a priori no problem. Super nice and quiet place.

title: (6320) Sabugal -
description: Large lot with free access, by the river. Access is via a dirt road, you have to drive slowly. turn right when you come across the river. Very pleasant and very quiet place. we spent one night there.

title: (6320-581) Vila Boa - 2 Rua do Fundo
description: water

title: (6320-581) Vila Boa - 62 N233-3
description: Cemetery parking, paved, simple access for a stage. Next to a beautiful washhouse and a fountain. Friendly village people.

title: (6320-261) - 9 Largo da Igreja
description: Special place for buses, larger campers not accessible !! Nice place to relax. There is a beach on a river of running spring water. There are toilet showers for men and women. There are barbecues and a tap at the tables.

title: (6320) Vale do Espinho - Unnamed Road
description: Excellent spot, with Fluvial beach on the river Côa, with bar support open 01/06 to 30/08, picnic area, service area with water and evictions, near the Serra da Malcata, WC, good for hiking.

title: (6090) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa -
description: Beautiful place to stay for pic-nic or night. No facilities. Surrounded by nature. For 4x4 or vans.

title: (6320-624) Soito - 57 Avenida São Cristovão
description: Park with a lot of space and bar/restaurant with WiFi really close where you can go for eat any time of the day. If you want to try something to eat, ask for bifanas or any typical food.

title: (6320) - Unnamed Road
description: Great view of the bay. Very inviting crystal clear water to the baths! Great view upon waking !!

title: (6090) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa - N332
title_short: (6090) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa - N332
description: Beautiful and quite spot, flat ground, place for 2 campers

title: (6320-530) Sortelha - 22 Rua Santa Catarina
description: Service area

title: (6320) - Unnamed Road
description: Nature corner by a lake. Access by track by all types of vehicles. Several possible locations. Bathing.

title: (6320) - N324
description: Big park next to and abandoned thermal ruin, and next to a modern hotel thermal spa. You can use the spa has an external, and still sleep in the van. Has a restaurant that you can go to in the hotel. We used the massage session to. Good place, with bike tracks. Good for 2 nights! No noice and very good sky at night.

title: (6320) - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of a dam lake. Several possible places. Access by track, all types of vehicles. Calm and peaceful. Swimming possible.

title: (6320) Termas do Cró - N324
description: Hidden between the ruins of the old thermal baths is a fully functional Eurorelais with drinking water, toilet emptying and a gray water outlet. Parking and staying the night is more comfortable in the parking lot of the new thermal baths, just 100m away.

title: (6090) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa -
description: Somewhat badly signposted and neglected rest area at the dam with seating and a beautiful view of the lake.  Several level parking spaces available.  Recommended for anyone who wants to go to the lake shore but doesn't want to take the other steep driveways to the shore.  In low season no traffic on the nearby road.

title: (6320) - N324
description: An esplanade next to a small chapel unobstructed and very easy access to 200m from the spa. Quiet but without shadow. The spa is great and very affordable.

title: (6090) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa -
description: Superb and calm site. We spent a night and a day there. Road access possible van and motorhome. Clear bathing water.

title: (6320) Vale do Espinho -
description: Great river beach. We parked for the night. No problem.

title: (6320-202) - 7 N233
description: Level parking. lots of dogs barking and howling most of the night. there was a bit of road noise. free wifi although very slow

title: (6320) - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place, on a reservoir-lake. Little bit sloping location on unpaved surfaces. On the edge of the Serra de Malcata Natural Park. No connection mobile network.

title: (6320-530) Sortelha - 23 Calçada de Santo Antão
description: Sortelha, aldeia histórica, parque junto casa do rancho folclórico aconselhável apenas a carros pequenos ou fourgon

title: (6320) - 2 Rua do Caminho Novo
description: Located behind the clock tower. Authorization confirmed by the tourist office, obviously respecting the place.

title: (6320-530) Sortelha - 24 Rua Doutor Vítor M. L. Pereira Neves
title_short: (6320-530) Sortelha - 24 Rua Doutor Vítor M. L. Pereira Neves
description: It’s a free park of a coffee shop ! Good shades to keep you RV cool ! Close to the center !

address.street: 24 Rua Doutor Vítor M. L. Pereira Neves

title: (6320-530) Sortelha - 31 Largo de São Genésio
description: Beautiful parking place for one or two vans. Overlooking the Castle of Sortelha. A little bit further ahead from the other parking spot behind the clock tower. Í spent the night here, very quiet and amazing views of the castle and the valley. Please always take your garbage with you! No bins around here.

title: (6320-530) Sortelha - 20 Rua Doutor Vítor M. L. Pereira Neves
title_short: (6320-530) Sortelha - 20 Rua Doutor Vítor M. L. Pereira Neves
description: Dirt roadside parking. Slightly sloping. Near the fortified village of Sortelha. Water available at the sculpted fountain. Exhibition of jars. Magnificent view over the valley. Low traffic road both day and night.

address.street: 20 Rua Doutor Vítor M. L. Pereira Neves

title: (6320-530) Sortelha - 46 Rua da Cerdeira
description: Next to the cemetery, a large sunny space with a magnificent view. Quiet area and very close to the castle and the town. The road to get there may look rough as you go but it is paved and smooth. We have a 6.36mt and we had no problems. We only spent a few hours there.

title: (6090-716) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa - 14 N233
title_short: (6090-716) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa - 14 N233
description: Drinking water

name: Parque Autocaravanas Alfaiates
title: (6320-081) Parque Autocaravanas Alfaiates
description: Quiet at the water's edge. 5 paved pitches. Small beach on water reservoir with playground.

title: (6320-125) - Casteleiro
description: New Motorhome area, 5€ includes electricity. Very quiet place, near the road but with almost no trafic.

title: (6090) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa - Unnamed Road
title_short: (6090) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa - Unnamed Road
description: Parking space in front of sanctuary, slightly sloping but very quiet.

title: (6320) Sortelha - Unnamed Road
description: Do you want to spend a night at a charming place? You are going to have hallucinations and you can also make visits

title: (6320) Soito - Unnamed Road
description: Cool place, under the trees, close to the playground, tables, water tap.

title: (6320) Soito - 16 Rua do Reboleiro
description: A very quiet parking space at an old monastery from the 13th-14th century

title: (6090-384) Meimoa - 7 Rua da Estrada Municipal
description: Parking near a kiosk bar and park for adults and children. The 100-meter restaurant offers good-value menus. Public bathroom.

title: (6355) Porto Ovelha - Unnamed Road
description: Wonderful place to stay out of beach season. beautiful walking paths and good quiet regional rodas for biking. very near, walking, there is the Martins restaurant, very good and cheap.

name: Área Serviço Autocaravanas
title: (6090) Área Serviço Autocaravanas
description: Nice small waterfall here... with possible swimming on small river/dam, very peaceful and quiet, with some shadows and restaurant on opposite riverside.

title: (6320) ALDEIA DEL PONTE - 4 Rua do Ribeiro
title_short: (6320) ALDEIA DEL PONTE - 4 Rua do Ribeiro
description: Free area near a small pond; P limited to 48 h. About 150 m W there is picnic area (4 + 3 large granite tables+seats) just aside very old bridge (= ponte) that gave name to village.

title: (10890) Valverde del Fresno - CC-65
description: Flat and spacious parking with a breathtaking view of the valley. Little light pollution for a guaranteed starry sky

title: (6090-552) Penamacor - 27 Rua da Nova
description: Large parking area. nice town.

title: (6250-073) Belmonte -
description: Excellent park near train station of city of Belmonte. Has playground, free water, free barbecue, and a big park (any size) to stay.

title: (6300) - N18
description: Small parking lot directly on the N18. Several trees provide shade. A small stream splashes down the slope under ferns. No facilities - please take your rubbish with you

title: (6250-076) Belmonte - Rua da Amoreira
description:
Santiago Park, Belmonte.
A bit noisy, since the bus stop and parking lot are right next to it, as well as the busy N345 thoroughfare. Disposal & water free. Paved, level surface.
Toilet & shower unfortunately closed due to vandalism. 500 m from the village, restaurant opposite.

title: (6250-020) Belmonte - Varanda Pilatos Belmonte
description: Laundry and one dryer.

title: (10890) Valverde del Fresno - EX-205
description: Near Valverde del Fresno with barbecue grills, road of Portugal, quiet site with a nice village

title: (6250-075) Belmonte - Quinta da Bica,EN 18 Km 19,4
description: Private Car Park for Campers - Eco Lodge Camping with individual electric hook-up and water, grey water and toilet disposal, large individual area, free WiFi, in a golf course area with access to the bar and fitness center, in a beautiful landscape area.  Free puttingreen. Address: Quinta da Bica, EN 18 Km 19,4 - 6250-075 Belmonte - Phone available to Pro subscribers.

name: Camping Valverde Natural
title: (10890) Camping Valverde Natural
description: Campsite with 25 pitches for tents and caravans, vans. And stone bungalows ... Super nice atmosphere .. And very clean outside as inside .... No Wifi.

title: (6250) Caria - Unnamed Road
description: Park near little “Monte do Bispo” dam, you can fish, hikes along the water Chanel or bike and motorbike. I would not recommend to swim. Nice view to Serra da Estrela mountain. Good for one or two nights of pure nature!

title: (6250-047) Belmonte - 9 Largo São Tiago
description: Park in the castle of Belmonte home of Pedro Álvares Cabral who discovered Brasil, and home of the most important historic Jewish village in Portugal. The park has 5 or 6 places flat, but the rest is not so flat. Excellent view of the mountain Serra da Estrela, could be windy and cold in winter. Free park and for to visit historic center and the 3 museums.

title: (6250-037) Belmonte - 168 Rua Pedro Álvares Cabral
description: Car park very close to castle. Too steep for overnight but fine to park

title: (37542) Navasfrías - 2 Calle Bóveda
description: Free drinking water fountain with tap and possibility to fill

title: (6250-062) Belmonte - Parque Bus Belmonte
description: Nice and new parking lot. Spacious and quiet, with an excellent view to Serra da Estrela. Nice tables near the parking spaces. No shadow. Close to 3 museums and not far from the centre. No services but water fountain.

title: (6250-056) Belmonte - 129 Largo Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Clean and beautiful car park with stone tables and superb views over the valley.

title: (6250-085) Belmonte - Bairro Do Castiçal
description: Belmonte. New parking area. Free, non services, walking distance from the city center.

title: (37542) Navasfrías - CV-148
description: Place on the river bank, with a small bathing area, a beautiful spot has a table and a green area, where you can park and spend the night without any problem, accessible from a road

title: (37542) Navasfrías - 31 CV-148
description: El Bardal is a recreational area with oak trees (one of the largest in Spain) and lots of shade, with stone tables and a beach bar. It is prohibited to enter the premises with vehicles but you can spend the night without problem in the surrounding area, also in the shade. There is a municipal swimming pool and a hostel. Easy access for motorhomes. Services open only on weekends in winter and in summer every day, now closed. Drinking water source. Children's park. 2 minutes from the town that is worth visiting, with restaurants, hostels and supermarkets.

name: Capela de Nossa Senhora do Bom Sucesso
title: (6090) Capela de Nossa Senhora do Bom Sucesso
title_short: (6090) Capela de Nossa Senhora do Bom Sucesso
description: Place to spend the night, it has no kind of service. But we are resting well here.

title: (6090) Penamacor - N346
description: Around the Capela de Nossa Senhora do Incenso several possibilities of stabilized parking and level. The place is free, exceptionally quiet and relaxing in the heart of a beautiful nature. Picnic tables and very clean toilets are available. No other service but optimal satellite and 4G reception. Here is the dream bivouac if you are looking for serenity without constraints on a peaceful parking.

title: (6300) Castanheira -
description: Mega quiet place in the middle of the most beautiful rock formations Two straight pitches for short 4x4.

title: (6250) Belmonte -
description: Picnic area with bins and a few tables. Close to Belmonte (4min by car). Under pines. A small road passes below.

name: Parque de Campismo do Freixial
title: (6090) Parque de Campismo do Freixial
description: Parque de campismo do Freixial very shaded, clean, sem barulho, with swimming pool and bar.

title: (6300) Guarda -
description: Just the fresh water and grey water, when you exit the gas station.

title: (6300) - Autoestrada da Beira Interior
description: Park in highway, good for a quick sleep, clean and good breakfast. Has fuel and gas, little supermarket, toilet and WiFi, park for all sizes.

title: (6355) Malhada Sorda - Unnamed road
description: Spectacular place to Park. we stayed 2 nights in may, but in summer Will be full of people...attention! very calm. we were Alone, but felt very safe.

title: (6250) Caria - 2 Rua José Luís Rebelo
description: Very good parking area in service station. Has free water, and pump, has car wash, a café shop for eat or drink some think, fuel, and big parking. To stop or sleep one night. The view of the mountain is wonderful. Toilet very clean. People very nice. Park in size with from 5.15m and 5un. With places up to 12m long.

title: (6250-111) Caria - 28 Bairro Santa Ana
description: Free water, good to drink. Has garbage recycling container’s. Calm area.

title: (6250-111) Caria - 35 Rua da Lage da Sobreira
title_short: (6250-111) Caria - 35 Rua da Lage da Sobreira
description: Good parking to sleep, has garbage can. Good view to the mountain. Had a fountain of water very near with free water to fill the tank. Has a playground for kids!

title: (6250-111) Caria - 22 Rua Fonte do Ruivo
description: Free water fountain, good to drink and good to fill up the tank, has access, next to the road for any size of van. Good view! Next to a Service Staion with good price on diesel. Good stop on the way to Spain, and near Old Historic Villages route.

title: (6250-111) Catraia da Caria - 20 Rua dos Eucaliptos
title_short: (6250-111) Catraia da Caria - 20 Rua dos Eucaliptos
description: Nice and calm place, parking of a train station. Space for 4 to 6 vans, quiet.

title: (6300) Guarda - Via de Cintura Externa da Guarda
title_short: (6300) Guarda - Via de Cintura Externa da Guarda
description: Place to park, near Macdonald’s flat park wit 20 places. Free WiFi, in Mc, services only in the restaurant but it’s a nice place to sleep a little for one night.

address.street: Via de Cintura Externa da Guarda

title: (6300) - N18-1
description: Quiet place to spend a night with superb views of the Serra de Estrela range. At the foot of the wind farm ... Nice mist in the morning but a little cool wind!

title: (37542) Navasfrías - Unnamed Road
description: Public parking, of the visitable Mine located in Navasfrías. From the road there is approx. 1km of forest track in very good condition. The views are unbeatable, it has picnic tables, a water fountain, a stream where you can cool off... from there you can visit the mines and several hiking trails. Nature in its purest form

title: () Guarda - Rua da Direcção Geral de Viação
title_short: () Guarda - Rua da Direcção Geral de Viação
description: Extended free P identified only to motorhomes (besides limited to 3,5 ton) illuminated and without shadows, in the new city garden of the city of Guarda, near the bus line to the city. Service area is on other side of street. No noise at night. A bit far from the city center.

address.street: Rua da Direcção Geral de Viação

title: (6300-408) Guarda - Rua Dona Maria Luísa Godinho
title_short: (6300-408) Guarda - Rua Dona Maria Luísa Godinho
description: Cemetery parking, downtown. No parking prohibition.

title: (6300-678) Guarda - 6 Avenida Comandante Salvador Nascimento
description: Slightly sloping parking just by the castle

title: (6300-865) Guarda - 78 Rua da Corredoura
description: Neat laundry 2 x 20 kg, 2x 14 kg, 2x 9 kg 4x dryer 13 kg, my 20 kg fit in. Just inside is a seamstress/seamstress. She repaired 3 clothes and 1 blanket very well and directly for me...for little money! ?

title: (6300-678) Guarda - 43 Rua Comandante Salvador do Nascimento
title_short: (6300-678) Guarda - 43 Rua Comandante Salvador do Nascimento
description: Parking next to the castle, it has a level area and another somewhat inclined

name: Parque de Campismo da Guarda
title: (6300-035) Parque de Campismo da Guarda
description: Very pleasant municipal campsite recently fitted out, quiet, comfortable, close to the historic center of Guarda, guard 24/24 One night in a camper van 2 people electricity: 13.50 euros

title: (6300-566) Guarda - 17 Avenida Monsenhor Mendes do Carmo
title_short: (6300-566) Guarda - 17 Avenida Monsenhor Mendes do Carmo
description: Laundry 8 minutes walk from the Municipal Park of Campismo. Open every day from 9:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. Good local, 9Kg and 19kg washing machine. includes detergent.

title: (6200-501) Aldeia do Souto - 7 Rua da Maria Janeira
title_short: (6200-501) Aldeia do Souto - 7 Rua da Maria Janeira
description: Great fountain of drinkable water. Romans were here before and mapped it before I did. Large flow of water. All free with park for one or two cars.

title: (6300) - EM619
description: Place in the countryside, in a steep path ... very isolated, but I get the 4g ... I can surf the internet .... for info I come from Guarda, where I could find gas bottles camping gas 907 for my T4, close to Decathlon ...

title: (6090) Aldeia do Bispo - 2 N332
description: Small gas station with water supply.

title: (10893) Villamiel - EX-205
description:
Free Park, no height limit and no services. Beautiful view of the mountains and very quiet.
Please take your garbage with you and enjoy!

title: (6300) - Rua do Fundo do Povo
description:
Clean drinking water - you have two options - one from the pipe( this one is dirty at this time, lack of usage? ) - second straight from the stream which comes up from nature( the access is easy ) 
also lots of wild nettles and  mint.
enjoy!!

title: (10892) San Martín de Trevejo - Cam de San Martín
title_short: (10892) San Martín de Trevejo - Cam de San Martín
description: Large space in a calm avocado, nice viewpoint and about 500m from the village. departure of hikes nearby. very quiet place to sleep. possibility of parking for several vehicles. shaded in summer.

title: (6400-069) Pinhel - 25 N16
description: Large brand new car park facing the GNR. 2 fountains are available with threaded faucet. Respect the premises. Selective sorting and garbage cans.

title: (6355) Freixo - N16
description: Nice location for lunch or overnight near a pond. Little shade but quiet place, frequented by local fishermen.

title: (6300-235) Valhelhas - 6300 Rua Eduardo Duarte
description: Drinking water fountain next to a bar and in a square, bread delivery at 11 a.m.

title: (10893) Villamiel - EX-205
description: You can stop here for the night. Small esplanade next to the road, flat. Motorway little frequented at night. Spectacular starry sky.

title: (6300) Corujeira - Estrada Caldeirão - Maçainhas
description: At the edge of a lake, in the shade of trees, quiet and pleasant place.

title: (6300) Maçainhas de Baixo - N338
description: It is about 10 years ago abandoned development area. The descent is in front of the bridge, 2nd exit on the left. Beautiful view of the lake and the valley. Approximately 50m to the lake, here is a great bathing facility. The place is very secluded and quiet.

title: (6200) - N18
description: A park to stop with a Fountain, and a little table to eat, next to the road. Park, fill water, eat and drive...

name: Valhelhas Camping
title: (6300) Valhelhas Camping
description: Camping site of Valhelhas, has little bit of everything Big free swimming pool, of the river Zezere, has electricity and shade. It is a Mountain camping.

title: (6300) - N338
description: Small nice place to spend a quiet night by a lake where you can swim. Accessible by a path engraved without any difficulties.

title: (6300) Trinta -
description: Quietly installed at the edge of the water, not disturbed at all. We spent 2 nights and we were able to enjoy swimming. Access is via a steep path, the ascent of which requires motor skills. Not recommended at CC

title: (6090-049) Águas - 18 Rua Governador Luís da C. Barreto
title_short: (6090-049) Águas - 18 Rua Governador Luís da C. Barreto
description: Fresh spring water, is also used as drinking water by locals. Very refreshing! Enjoy your meal

address.street: 18 Rua Governador Luís da C. Barreto

title: (10892) San Martín de Trevejo - 21 CC-1.2
description: A car park located in the municipal swimming pools. Quiet place to spend the night. 5 minutes from downtown.

title: (10892) San Martín de Trevejo - Avenida Chafaril
title_short: (10892) San Martín de Trevejo - Avenida Chafaril
description: Very nice location, next to the natural swimming pool. Beach bar and showers. In the night people come to have a drink, but it's not annoying. The ground is made of earth and tilted. The village and the scenery are beautiful and well worth a visit. Capacity for 2 or 3 motorhomes.

title: (10892) San Martín de Trevejo - 7 Camino Vallito
title_short: (10892) San Martín de Trevejo - 7 Camino Vallito
description: Night of wide and quiet views. Viewpoint on the side of the road to stop or spend the night with views of the magical town of “San Martín de Trevejo”, a must-see for being with well-kept alleys and a beautiful and unique main square.

title: (6300) - EM556
description: Good drinking water nearby the dam at Caldeirao lake , it's on the side of the road,  it's easy to miss it.

title: (6300) - EM556-1
description: Superb rest area above the body of water, path to the right before treatment unit, 50 m nice path.

title: (6355) Castelo Mendo - 14 Rua Direita
description: Official Motorhome Aire of the medieval village Castelo Mendo. 3 Official big places on the area down below, and regular car spaces on the upper part with tables and benches which is also allowed to overnight. Public toilet inside the little village.

title: (6200) Sarzedo - 8 Largo Augusto Lopes
description: Little park with water, place to sit and park. Good view, in small mountain town.

title: (6230) - Unnamed Road
description:
Free parking under big trees.
not so quiet on weekends.
small café, toilets and showers close by.

title: (6230-527) Capinha - Unnamed road
description: Parking at the entrance to the village of Capinha 3 places, village at 300 m with bar, small store Public WC at 2 km, a dam with a leisure center for swimming possible

title: (6300) Manteigas - N232
description: Nice quiet place, by the river. The road is close without being glued. Ok for the kids so. Easy access.

title: () - E802
description: In the middle of the vineyards, splendid view. branches limit the height.

title: (6300-270) Vila Soeiro - Eira de Fora
description: Picnic area in the village. To eat before doing the Passadiços do Mondego route. Super quiet, with picnic tables.

title: (6355) - A25
description: Big highway park, with a little of everything. Try a “Bifana” bread with meat, very typical in Portugal. Wc, garbage, fuel, and more... a lot of space to park and sleep. Free park no problems with security (very safe).

title: (6200) Sarzedo - EM501
description: Big point of view, called roundabout of Sarzedo. It is a part of the circuit of Portugal tour on bike, and it is a point of departure of hikes.

title: (10893) Villamiel - 23 Avenida Plaza de Toros
description: It is a car park next to the sports hall, bullring and municipal swimming pool. The place is quiet during the day and at night, it is very well leveled. It does not have water and to be able to empty the tank. But it is ideal, to rest, or to know the town of Villamiel.

title: (6200) Sarzedo - EM501
description: Called the top of “Sarzedo” mountain, inside of the Natural park of Serra da Estrela. It is very calm only nature. Little place to park inside the woods. Very known road because of cycling (Tour of Portugal).

title: (10893) Villamiel - Carretera a San Martín
description: Picnic area, space for four campers to spend the day and night. Nice place with good views. Respect the environment, because it is not intended for camping. The neighbors are respectful.

title: (6200) Teixoso - CM1014
description: Picnic table, shady and quiet, trash bin and water.

title: (6200) - EM501
description: Parking along the road. All nature around! Good to sleep 1 day, area in forest no services. Flat terrain for small or big vans.

title: (10893) Villamiel - 8 Calle Noguera
description: Quiet place in a very beautiful village. we spent there two amazing days.

title: (6200) Teixoso - Rua Carlos Mourão, Terlamonte
description: Nice farm near Serra da Estrela, with mountain view. Electricity, internet and shower (best mosaic shower ever!) available for a small fee. Great area to explore - host knows the area very well and can help. Not a commercial place, so no official opening hours. To ask access, please contact phone number available to Pro users.

title: (6300) Videmonte - CM1176
description: Car park beginning of the Mondego catwalk route, a little inclined, quiet and safe, perfect for doing the catwalks

title: (10893) Villamiel - CC-143
description: Viewpoint with good views of Trevejo Castle, shaded area and place to sit. would fit 4 or 5 motorhomes

title: (6300) Guarda - N16
description: Very nice, clean and level place with trees and seating on granite benches

name: Parque de Campismo Rural Vale do Beijames
title: (6300) Parque de Campismo Rural Vale do Beijames
title_short: (6300) Parque de Campismo Rural Vale do Beijames
description: The vale do beijames rural camping site is located in one of the most spectacular valleys of the serra da estrela, at 540 meters altitude, ideal for camping and access to the highest and most interesting points of the mountain, little explored. Located a few meters from the river beijames, between the village of vale de amoreira (manteigas) and verdelhos (covilhã), in a magnificent space from which you can get a whole magnitude that impresses, especially the agro-pastoral mosaic, still with open activity traditional. The area reserved for campers is dominated by a small woodland, with hardwoods and a variety of more than 60 species of trees. ​ it is the ideal place to enjoy the best moments and take the best memories of the serra da estrela.

title: (6300) Aldeia Viçosa - N16
description: Free public area to park, close to a beautiful, a little bit outside the city. But nice and quite place

title: (6300) Vale de Amoreira - 10 Rua Direita
description: Free and very quiet public car park with about 40 spaces, next to a sports field and a playground. It does not offer services, but it is ideal for a one-day stop.

title: (6300-101) Aldeia Viçosa -
description: Close to the welcoming village where you can enjoy a €3 beer in front of the cute little church, a quiet, uncrowded spot, ideal for a night. Near the river and hiking trail, on the way to Compostela. Flat terrain.

title: (10894) Villamiel - 3-16 CC-143
description: Picnic area-belvedere before reaching the city. Quiet area next to the road. Picnic area with several shaded wooden tables. The parking lot has no trees. There is a fountain 100 meters right at the entrance to town. Very quiet place to spend the night and see the ruins of the castle. In the village there is a bar. Beautiful region. Be careful, you have to get there by the road that goes through Villamiel to get to the belvedere.

title: () Vale de Amoreira - 40 N232
description: Parking with a great view of the Serra de Estrela.

title: (6300-245) Bairro da Ribeira - 61 Bairro do Ribeiro
title_short: (6300-245) Bairro da Ribeira - 61 Bairro do Ribeiro
description: Quite flat parking lot, very quiet, perfect to spend  the day

name: Quinta das Vinte Quelhas
title: (6300-025) Quinta das Vinte Quelhas
description: Great place to park your van overlooking the Mondego valley in the Serra da Estrela area, shaded by linden trees throughout the park area. Dry compost toilets available, possibility to shower and do laundry. Upon request, Miguel will cook a 4-course vegetarian menu. Possibility of cooking workshops or beekeeping. Water from a mountain spring, 6 donkeys and a goat available. Possibility of donkey hikes, river kayak rentals, paragliding tandems depending on the weather. Aldeias Históricas nearby, tons of mountain viewpoints, sky for bird watching, perfect for BTT downhill, lots of boulders to climb and climbing routes nearby. Possibility to buy seasonal fruit and vegetables from the farm. PS: remember that a fire engine has to drive through the hamlet. So if it can make it, so will your RV, unless it's a really gigantic vehicle. Mine is an old Mercedes 407D 7m long with 72hp and only 4 gears and it gets on the farm well! PPS: If you arrive and nobody is at the farm, just park your van, we might just be visiting bees or working on the top of the mountain. Call us!

title: (6200) Verdelhos -
description: Calm and quiet place. Pure and fresh water

title: (6060) Monsanto -
description: Offgrid farm with stunning views of beautiful Monsanto(10km)! The natural pool of Penha Garcia (18km) offers shady picnic areas, a reservoir with a river leading to the pool, fossils, an ancient mill, a castle with spectacular views of the valley. Both sights can also be reached via hiking trails. In the beautiful nature, rare species of birds can be seen. Access is possible for campers up to 8.50 m. We speak English, Portuguese, Italian and German. Please always contact us beforehand.

title: (6300-190) Rocamondo -
description: A place in the middle of nature. No facilities but beautiful view and very quiet. Take the road at the monuments and continue until the deserted football field. Take the 2nd left behind the football field. There's the flat terrain.

title: (6260) Sameiro - EN 232
description: Parking lot with beautiful hiking trails. Not far away there is a natural swimming pool and a small bar that is closed in October. Not too much shade, but there are a few trees at the end of the parking lot.

name: Grass Reboleira
title: (6260) Grass Reboleira
description: Lovely campground next to a river with riverside beach bar, bbq facilities, free wifi, canoe rental and zip lining.

title: (6060-088) Monsanto - 7A Avenida Heróis do Ultramar
description: Esplanade in barren countryside with views of Monsanto (1.5 km). Along a quiet road at night. Bar 50 meters. Starting point for Monsanto. The GNR sends the ACs here. Close to plaza with bus to Monsanto.

title: (6060) Monsanto - 2 Beco do Forno
description: A large parking lot that allows you to spend the night. It has public toilets for the day, a fountain and dining tables. It is in the town of Relva. Ideal for visiting Monsanto. To thank the locality of Relva for welcoming the CCs and vans with pleasure. Accessible by truck from Medelim.

title: (6260) - N232
description: Superb place by the river to spend the night, 300m from a campsite. Small path down a paved road. Very little passage

title: (6060) Penha Garcia - Unnamed Road
description: Possibility to park directly on the lake, road and dirt / pebbles, circulate smoothly. Places in the sun and in the shade. Let's be respectful with the environment at all times. You can spend the night. Spectacular place.

title: (6060-051) - 19 Avenida Medina
description: Medelim - Municipality of Idanha-a-Nova Next to the Sanctuary of the Lord of Calvary Village with numerous Judaic vestiges.

title: (10857) Acebo - CCV-32.3
description: Nice place, surrounded by several natural swimming pools, with large green areas, bar and public services. Departure of hiking trails.

title: (6060-311) Penha Garcia - 11 Rua da Lapa
description:
Asphalt parking lot directly at the lake. Slightly inclined.
Pretty steep descent/ascent, but all paved.
Had a wonderfully quiet overnight stay.

title: (10857) Acebo - CC-32.3
description: Parking natural swimming pools on the banks of El Acebo. Ground for all vehicles, besides being the most suitable for motorhomes of all sizes. From this car park you can access the El Jevero and Carrecia pools. There is a bar in the 2 natural pools.

title: (6060) Penha Garcia - Unnamed Road
description: The spot across the lake was a bit too hard to get to with a large Grand California. So I found this spot which is beautiful because it oversees the lake. Highly recommended.

title: (6060) Penha Garcia -
description: Access to the beach on the other sites being very complicated, we fell back on this small car park on the side of the road with a nice view of the lake. There is almost no traffic at night, very quiet. However no service.

title: (6060-091) Monsanto - 11 Avenida Fernando Ramos Rocha
description: Ideal parking for visiting Monsanto. pretty flat. We arrived at 10pm and it was pretty empty. There is free WC, clean but without a lid on the toilets, a few meters up the hill. There are no signs prohibiting night or day parking. We took a nice walk through the town, at night.

title: (10857) Acebo - CC-32.3
description: Parking Next to the road but very quiet to sleep. Next to splendid natural pool beautiful setting. Possibility of eating in a restaurant. With services.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 12 Rua Humberto Delgado
description: Fuel station (low cost), with free-WiFi, has Coffee shop, little supermarket, bathroom, place to park, walk the dog, water, and free pressure check for tires. Has a big supermarket in 50m. Good stop, has place to park any size.

title: (6060-344) Penha Garcia - 42 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Parking well located next to the tank, they take two motorhomes

title: (6200-027) Covilhã - 2B Rua Humberto Delgado
description: Picnic area with free barbecue. Park in front in the supermarket were it has also free Wi-Fi and WC.

title: () - N340
description: Really nice spot under the trees near the river . Very quiet in the middle of nowhere. Good to visit the natural area around there. Small road access but good opportunity to turn around at the end.

title: (37540) Fuenteguinaldo - 72C Carretera Navasfrías
description: Picnic area in Fuenteguinaldo with barbecues. Shaded tables. In summer nearby municipal swimming pool with poolside snack bar. Bakeries and shops in the town.

title: (37540) Fuenteguinaldo - 68 Carretera Navasfrías
description: Parking with nine spaces, it is reached by a dirt road. The squares slightly inclined. There is water but without the possibility of connecting a hose. Trash can. The pools are close. Fuenteguinaldo is thanked for his effort for the ACs.

title: (6060-388) Penha Garcia - 9 Largo 1º de Maio
description: Large parking area at the bottom of the village.  Marked on Google maps as camper van overnight parking. No services, although there is water at the communal washing facility.  Free wifi at the junta on the other side of the sports court.  This is a much better area for parking motorhomes than the other parking higher in the village.

title: (6060) Monsanto -
description: Follow the sign capella San Pedro de Vira Corca at the end of the dead end (tarmac road til the end, no problem with a over 7m with over cab), a large flat surface to park by the little chapel and enjoy a gorgeous scenery of massive granite boulders. Climbing to Monsanto village by beautiful footpaths is 1km and there are many more to explore.

title: (10850) Hoyos -
description: Caño de la Madre Enchanted forest in the heart of the Sierra de Gata (Cáceres). One of the most beautiful areas of Extremadura, in the northwest of the province of Cáceres, near Castilla, even closer to Portugal, the neighboring region of Las Hurdes. The guest has the option of camping at the bottom of the meadow or at the top of the forest, 10,000 square meters of nature, with plenty of shade and a variety of fauna and flora, holm oaks, cork oaks and bushes. Very good place for bird watching, usually large birds of prey and other smaller birds fly. Only on the way can you choose where you want to rest. There are incredible views of Hoyos and various towns in the Sierra de Gata. At night it becomes a wonderful planetarium where you can see the entire sky with clarity and silence.

title: (37481) Fuentes de Oñoro - 54 Calle Pedro Mateos
title_short: (37481) Fuentes de Oñoro - 54 Calle Pedro Mateos
description: Fuentes de Oñoro, a town close to the Portuguese border (in 5 minutes you are in Portugal) There is a gas station, a bar that closes at 2 in the morning, a Carrefour. The parking very quiet, day and night. With shadow. Nice green views. The neighbors very friendly. They have told us that they will soon open a parking lot for motorhomes.

title: (37523) Peñaparda - Junto a la Piscina Municipal
title_short: (37523) Peñaparda - Junto a la Piscina Municipal
description: As of June 2019, Peñaparda has an area of motorhomes belonging to the Ruta Raia Norte (the first cross-border motorhome route in Europe), located in the area of the municipal swimming pools (recreational area of the Majadillas), with public baths , picnic areas, barbecue areas, playground and, of course, eco-sanitary platform for tugboats and parking for these vehicles.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 4 Alameda da Europa
description: GPL fuel station, with every kind of bottles and pump. Has also diesel, it closes at 19h and it’s closed at lunch time, but it’s the only GPL pump station in 20km.

title: (37481) Fuentes de Oñoro - 11 Avenida de Portugal
title_short: (37481) Fuentes de Oñoro - 11 Avenida de Portugal
description: Supermercado Raimundo has Spanish Repsol gas cylinders just across the border. The surrounding petrol stations only have their own brands.

title: (6355-264) Vilar Formoso - 5 Avenida dos Combatentes da Guerra Colonial
title_short: (6355-264) Vilar Formoso - 5 Avenida dos Combatentes da Guerra Colonial
description: Large parking behind the station, next to the municipal hall. quiet and light No services just for a night of transit quiet!

address.street: 5 Avenida dos Combatentes da Guerra Colonial

title: (10857) Acebo, Cáceres - EX-109
description: Picnic tables in front of a superb viewpoint with enough space to stop in a motorhome

title: (6355-325) Vilar Formoso - 4 Largo da Ribeira Velha
title_short: (6355-325) Vilar Formoso - 4 Largo da Ribeira Velha
description: Free parking area for motorhomes, approx 18 spaces in part shade.  short walk or drive to supermarkets and lovely town centre.

title: (6355-339) Vilar Formoso - 113 Avenida das Tílias
description: Vila Formoso service area, Spain-Portugal border, payment at the store in front of the service area.

title: (6355) Vilar Formoso - 6 Avenida Santa Maria
description: Supermarket with bottle gas, fresh bread, and free bathroom.

title: (6060-091) Monsanto - 2 Rua da Laginha
description: Small picnic area with two tables and a water point. It is on the way to the mountain village of Monsanto.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 1 Rua Francisco Rodrigues Taborda
description: Park in paved ground, lots of space, has a garden next if you climb the stairs and cross the train line. Very calm at night. Has recycling garbage near. Excellent for 1 night sleep, and if you want to walk the dog.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 2 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
description: Place to park in a friendly Supermarket (Intermarche), very popular place to park for Caravan’s. It has a “Roady” (quick mechanic services and automobile pieces), and Bricomarche for brico stuff. It is very popular place for caravan’s to stop and sleep here. You can wash your car here of refuel your tank. They sell gas bottles to.

title: (6200) Covilhã - N18
description: Self-Service laundry, with bath rooms, and a supermarket has also a pharmacy and a McDonalds!

title: (6200) Covilhã - 16 Rua Professor António Esteves Lopes
title_short: (6200) Covilhã - 16 Rua Professor António Esteves Lopes
description: Big Park under public summer swimming pool. Next to train and bus station, quiet at night. Toillets and a big garden. Selfservice laundry 5min away.

title: (6200) Covilhã -
description: Train station, free parking outside and free toilets, has a coffee shop inside. Big car park outside.

title: (6200-221) Covilhã - 73 Rua 30 de Junho
description: Drinking water fountain, free and good to drink, or to fill tanks. It has a place to Wash your clothes (very commum in the area). Very large flow. You may need a hose.

title: (10895) Cilleros - CC-72
description: Picnic area next to the Cilleros sports center. No services but with a source nearby. High pine forest without problems for motorhomes. We have been 4 nights and without any problem. Picnic tables in the same place ...

title: (6200-025) Covilhã - 5 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Self Service laundry, during the day you can leave and pick up later. They have service of iron shirts and other clothes. I will put the prices later! Has WiFi! Not easy to park, but with some patience.

title: (6200-546) Covilhã - 7 Avenida do Anil
description: Big park behind the bus terminal and the park “Jardim do Lago”. Just to sleep. Has a coffee shop, bath room, ATM and playgrounds. One way park entrance in the bus terminal and exit for the train station.

title: (6200) - 1 Rua do Bairro dos Freixos
description: Big park, far from city, little stream, a café, free gimn, and lots of places to sport (basket, volley, and football). A little noise at night, near IP2 road. A lot of trees.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 56 Rua do Pinho Manso
description: Public park, serves also for a winter swimming pool, park is free, no noice but no services around. Far from city center, but it has a walking bridge and a free elevator to the city center. Playground is on the upper part near the school. The park is not flat, but it is silent and good to sleep. Upper in the road it is flat, and also good to park, long veicules, but it is near the road. There is a hike circuit passing here!

title: (6200-197) Covilhã - 12 Rua Conde da Ericeira
description: Several parking lot spaces that belong to diferent public services - social services, schools and police station. It's empty on weekends and I suppose it's also empty on weekdays after labour hours. There are some places leveled others not so leveled. There's also a library around the corner open on weekdays from 10 to 18h30. 20 minute away walking (uphil) there's the city center.

title: (6200-505) Covilhã - 22 Rua Centro de Artes
description: Public park, with picnic tables. With free WiFi, public toilets, playground and lots of grass. Big parking for cars outside.

title: (6200-546) Covilhã - Rua Centro de Artes
description: Parking in public named “park of arts”, has wc in the top park of the park. Free WiFi but some times does not work. Calm and good for one night. Can play football, skate and little park for children.

title: (6200-507) Covilhã - R. do Bairro dos Caldeirões
title_short: (6200-507) Covilhã - R. do Bairro dos Caldeirões
description: Gravel car park at the end of the road, right by the football stadiums. It's pretty quiet at night. One is fast in the city.

name: Casa Na Floresta
title: (6230-180) Casa Na Floresta
description:
A peaceful and lovely campsite. If you are looking for a place to chill and be surrounded with nature this is the place. There is a place for one or two campers up to 7m. Easy access and flat. The toilets and showers are 100m walk nice and clean. there is a fully featured kitchen with everything you need to prepare a hot meal. a washing machine is here as well.
important! Please contact before showing up :)

title: (6200-507) Covilhã - Unnamed Road
description: Very big park at Athletic Stadium complex, has shower in the complex. The use of the complex is free and open till 24h with light. The park is free but it has not much around. It has a very good Sushi restaurant across the road. Parking for any size.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 4 Rua Vasco da Gama
description: Nice place to park, in the city at day or night. Near a green park (garden), with free toilet and free water, near cafés and restaurant. As two free elevator's to the center of city. Near post office and 5min away from shopping mall. 5min away by foot from selfservice laundry. The laundry as free wifi (near the court). Best place in the city.

title: (10850) Hoyos - Calle Calvario
description: Hoyos high school parking lot "Valles de Gata". Very quiet location during non-school periods. 10 mins walk from Plaza Mayor. Very close to playground. 4 km from Hoyos, there is a very good natural swimming pool with easy access and parking.

title: (6200-051) Covilhã - LB Avenida Frei Heitor Pinto
title_short: (6200-051) Covilhã - LB Avenida Frei Heitor Pinto
description: Laundry Self Service dificult to park near, but in 5min on foot near the Fireman you have huge free place to park.

title: (6200-507) Covilhã -
description: Famous park for big vans, the best park to go to the shopping center. It is a road inside of a residencial area, but safe and clean.

title: (37522) Villasrubias - 47 CL-526
description: Parking of a natural pool in a green environment. Several chiringuitos that serve good food. The pool has public toilets and showers, all free. There is a park for children and a swimming pool created with natural water adapted for them.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 37 Rua Doutor António Plácido da Costa
title_short: (6200) Covilhã - 37 Rua Doutor António Plácido da Costa
description: Very big free central park in city. With free Wc.

address.street: 37 Rua Doutor António Plácido da Costa

title: (6200-507) Covilhã -
description: Big park of stadium, big silence to sleep. Good view over the mountain. Good for one night.
